price: 26. Inaydaan caabudin waxaan ahayn Alle, waxaan idiinka cabsan cadaab Maalin xanuun badan (Maalinta Aakhiro).
arabic: أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: an lā taʿbudū illā al-laha innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin alīmin
